attributes.action: ensure that a no vote means NO. (or is europe a dictatorship ?)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Robert Mugabe is suspected of vote rigging there is an outcry.
When the EU ignores a no vote our so called politicians go along with it.
Since when have I lived in a dictatorship ?

The more power goes to Europe the worse it will get, in what other job could you reduce your responsibility for events and expect the same or more pay for doing it ?

Only our Members of Parliament it seems.

If the majority want to be part of Europe, so be it, equally though , if the majority don't, then that should also be heeded.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
